Title: Ghajini
Writer: A.R. Murugadoss (screenplay), A.R. Murugadoss (story), A.R. Murugadoss (tamil dialogue), Shashank (dialogue: Telugu version)
Actors: Suriya, Asin, Nayanthara, Pradeep Singh Rawat
Plot: Sanjay Ramaswamy, who is suffering from short-term memory loss, sets out on a quest to find the people who were responsible for his ladylove Kalpana's murder.
